perl -p -e 's/./chr((ord($&)-0x21)&0xff)/gse' a.zan|hexdump -C|less


0x14..0x28: G

0x20..0x26: date+time
0x28: "AZANF21 ..." das "F"
0x29: "AZANF21" die "2"
0x30..0x58: pilot (chr - 0x21)
0x58..0x80: glider type
0x80..0xa8: competition class
0xa8..0xb2: glider id
0xb2..0xbc: competition id

0xbd:
-B1356175103200N00742429EV0043800000007000
+B1356175103200N00742429EV0000000000007000

0xbc: hoehe genullt??
0xbd: G
0xbe..0xc0: altitude
0xc0: G
0xc1: G
0xc2++: "LZAN PowerOn' weg
0xc3++: LZAN PowerOn++
0xc4++: LZAN "poweron" weg
0xc5++: normal=f6/d5
        f5: alt2+=200
        f4: alt2-=200
        f3: alt+=25
        f2, f1, f0, f7: alt-=25
0xc6..0xce: G
0xce: task bla weg?
0xd0..0xd3: task bla weg?
0xd3..0xd9: task datum


0xd6: "C" -C080608090105080608000101
          +C080608100105080608000101
0xd7: "C" -C080608090105080608000101
          +C080608090205080608000101
0xf0..0xfc: task wp1 name
0xfc..0x100: latitude
0x100..0x104: longitude
0x10a..0x116: task wp2 name
0x124: task wp3 name
0x13e: task wp4 name
0x158: task wp5 name
0x170: erster punkt... sekunden?
0x171: latitude grad
0x172: latitude min
0x173: latitude sec
0x174: latitude sec II
0x175..0x179: longitude
0x179: noise?
0x17a: noise?
0x17b: alt
0x17c: zweiter punkt? minuten
0x17d: latitude??
0x17e: latitude??

0x171:
+B1356171438666N00742429EV0043800000007000 -2 (=0)
+B1356173250933N00742429EV0043800000007000 --
-B1356175103200N00742429EV0043800000007000
+B1356176915466N00742429EV0043800000007000 ++

+B1356170540000N00742429EV0043800000007000 +3
+B1356172352266N00742429EV0043800000007000 +4
deg+=18, min+=12, sec+=16 (65536s)

+B1356175120266N00742429EV0043800000007000 ++
+B1356175137333N00742429EV0043800000007000 +2

min+=17, sec+=4 (1024s)
